Generation IX.Scarlet: The gentle Dudunsparce will put Pokémon that wander into its nest onto its back and carry them to the entrance.
Generation IX.Violet: A recent study uncovered that the number of segments a Dudunsparce’s body has is determined by the Pokémon’s genes.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Evolve Dunsparce ( Two-Segment/Three-Segment Forms ) Area Zero ( Two-Segment Form ) Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ ) ( Two-Segment Form )
Generation IX.Violet: Evolve Dunsparce ( Two-Segment/Three-Segment Forms ) Area Zero ( Two-Segment Form ) Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ ) ( Two-Segment Form )
Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Oni Mountain , Chilling Waterhead , Timeless Woods
